'''"Still-Budding Artistry"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

One copy of "Still-Budding Artistry" can be obtained from Julien's camp after completing {{Quest|An Artist Adrift (Part 3)}} and waiting for the next [[Daily Reset]].
